page.title: 12HOUSING IN EAST HARROW
page.content: Semi-detached houses are the most popular type of house in this area. Terraced houses are the second most common. Houses in Stanmore and northern Edgware are larger and more expensive than in other parts of the D-Block. People who live in these districts tend to be well-off and rather older than elsewhere. Many of the larger houses have between 12 and 15 living rooms. In other parts of the D-Block, houses have fewer habitable rooms. Many of the roads surveyed have a wide variety of housing types in them. All but a few were built of bricks and mortar. There are relatively few blocks of flats in the area. A large proportion of houses are privately owned.
